entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 4 mm along parts of the coast. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late in the evening then light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
